description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Spacecats:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Spacecat}s, they deal 5% more damage with attacks and spells for each permanent Spell Gem each of your creatures have that do not belong to their class. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Spacecat
